mapper.select: SELECT L.LOCA_ID, L.LOCA_NAME, L.LOCA_INFO, L.LOCA_PIC_PATH, L.LOCA_PLACE, M.MANAGER_EMAIL FROM LOCATIONS L LEFT JOIN MANAGER M ON L.LOCA_PLACE = M.LOCA_PLACE ORDER BY LOCA_ID

SELECT L.LOCA_ID, L.LOCA_NAME, L.LOCA_INFO, L.LOCA_PIC_PATH, L.LOCA_PLACE, M.MANAGER_EMAIL, L.LOCA_POINT_X, L.LOCA_POINT_Y FROM LOCATIONS L LEFT JOIN MANAGER M ON L.LOCA_PLACE = M.LOCA_PLACE WHERE LOCA_ID = #{locaId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATIONS (USER_ID, LOCA_ID, RES_DATE, RES_REGDATE, RES_COUNT, RES_CONTENT, RES_AMP, RES_RESULT, RES_TIME, RES_TIME_LAST, DATE_NUM) VALUES (#{userId}, #{locaId}, #{resDate}, #{resRegDate}, #{resCount}, #{resContent}, #{resAmp}, #{resResult}, #{resTime}, #{resTimeLast}, #{dateNum})
